pap1213.assignment.nbody

Class Universe

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • pap1213.assignment.nbody.Universe
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Universe
extends java.lang.Thread
    Class Universe extends the Thread Java class.

    It represents the thread which controls the behavior of the simulation calling the executor to calculate all body future values, and then call the NBodyFrame to draw the new body position

    Author:
    Nompleggio Pietro Antonio, Buscarini Andrea

      • Universe

        public Universe(int nbody,
        NBodyFrame mainFrame)
        Class Universe constructor.
        Parameters:
        nbody - the number of the bodies
        mainFrame - the reference of the JFrame that contains all the graphics information and draw the bodies

    • Method Detail

      • setBodies

        Setter method

        Set the bodies array with the value passed

        Parameters:
        bodies - the reference of the array that contains all the bodies

      • start_pressed

        public void start_pressed()
        Start Simulation

        This method start the simulation, it's connected with the singleStep and pause AtomicBoolean values

      • pause_pressed

        public void pause_pressed()
        Pause Simulation

        This method pause the simulation, it's connected with the singleStep and pause AtomicBoolean values

      • singleStep_pressed

        public void singleStep_pressed()
        Single Step Simulation

        This method pause the simulation, and port it forward one step at a time it's connected with the singleStep and pause AtomicBoolean values

      • stop_pressed

        public void stop_pressed()
        Pause Simulation

        This method stop the simulation, it's connected with the singleStep, pause and stop AtomicBoolean values. It remove the frame of the simulation and prepare to start a new one.

      • printBody

        public void printBody()
        Print Body method

        This method call the JFrame that draw the new body position.

      • run

        public void run()
        run method

        This method is the default method of the Thread Java Class that, start when the start() reference method it's called. It create the Executors that invoke the all the call methods of each body, and wait until all bodies return their future information, then iterate all this future BodyInfo Structure and update each body, eventually draw the new position in the frame.

        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
